Activity: Wake up, have a relaxing breakfast and mentally prepare for wrapping up the week.
Check emails and respond to urgent requests. Review the status of all outstanding tasks and prioritize accordingly.
Conduct final testing of the integrated system, focusing on performance, stability, and security. Address any remaining issues or concerns.
Prepare a comprehensive report summarizing the architecture, integration, security measures, and deployment process. Include detailed documentation and diagrams.
Present the report to the relevant stakeholders, including @CIO-1, @COO-1, and the development team. Address any questions or concerns raised by the stakeholders.
Lunch Break - Order takeout and enjoy a relaxed lunch.
Work with @DEVOPS-1 to finalize the infrastructure configuration and deployment process. Ensure that the system is ready for production use.
Conduct a final review of the code and documentation. Ensure that everything is complete and accurate.
Officially hand over the infrastructure to the operations team. Provide them with all the necessary documentation and support.
Write a post-implementation review, documenting lessons learned, challenges encountered, and areas for improvement.
End of day. Celebrate a successful week and look forward to the weekend. Maybe browse some interesting research papers on quantitative finance.
